posts.post_content:
Looking to buy the following cards for as little as possible. Not so concerned about the condition, as long as you can tell what they are and they're not completely sawed apart.

t205 Hal Chase (any is fine)
t205 Russ Ford (any is fine)
t205 Charles Hemphill
t205 Lou Criger
t205 Ed Sweeney
t205 James Vaughn

I'm not looking to spend a lot of money, but if you have any of these in not-so-great condition, I'd love to buy 'em.
